snippet: After an early burst on strong bank results, investors sold yield-paying stocks later in the day as bond yields rose....
lead_paragraph: After an early burst on strong bank results, investors sold yield-paying stocks later in the day as bond yields rose.

headline.main: Early Gains on Wall Street Fade, Leaving Stocks Barely Higher
headline.print_headline: Early Gains on Wall St. Fade, Leaving Stocks Barely Higher
